Package controller

package controller
  • Class
    Description
    AccountCreationException
    Custom exception thrown when an account creation fails due to some invalid data or error.
    AccountEditException
    Custom exception thrown when an account creation fails due to some invalid data or error.
    EmptyFieldException
    EmptyFieldException extends our custom ValidatioNException, this exception is thrown when the user does not input some data into an input field
    ErrorWriter
    ErrorWriter class, creates a class that Formats any exceptions and writes them to a file
    GrowingMains
    Driver for GrowingPains application
    PasswordInconsistentException
    PasswordInconsistentException extends our custom ValidatioNException, this exception is thrown when the user attempts to change password, but the new password and confirm password fields do not match, or if the user does not input the correct old password
    ValidationException
    A custom exception ValidationException is thrown when the user inputs some invalid data
